constituent: general, thread, spiderman, public, eight, elbows, heart
heisigStory: This kanji, meaning universal or widespread, is composed of three elements: thread . . . public . . . heart.
koohiiStory1: Spiderman could not achieve general acceptance by the media even after winning the public´s heart.
koohiiStory2: General or universal refers to the common thread running through the public's heart.
words: synthesis, coordination, putting together, integration, composite
